title.v: Điều chỉnh thông tin chứng từ

action.text: declare @hash varchar(32), @c bit, @d bit, @k varchar(6) exec AI_ERP$System$CheckSum @@userID, @chkpass, 0, @c output select @c as val return

declare @r int, @q nvarchar(4000), @d smalldatetime, @k varchar(32) select @d = @ngay_ct
set @q = 'select @k = ma_gd from [@@appDatabaseName]..hrm01$' + convert(char(6), @d, 112) + ' where stt_rec = ''' + replace(@stt_rec, '''', '') + '''' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@k varchar(32) output', @k output
if @k = '1' set @r = 7 else if @k = '2' set @r = 8 else if @k = '6' set @r = 9
select @r as result return
